title: 1912 Font for Sri Lanka Identity
content: Hi there, I'm looking for suggestions of interesting fonts which were designed in 1912 for the development of an identity for an old house in Sri Lanka (built in 1912) which I'm currently restoring. Any ideas appreciated, thanks.
author: Bleaso

comments.content:
ATF released these typefaces in 1912:  
Antique Shaded  
Bodoni  
Cheltenham Bold and Extrabold  
Rugged Roman  
Venetian

You can check other foundries’ releases here:  
 [http://www.klingspor-museum.de/Schriftgiessereien.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131219060123/http:/www.klingspor-museum.de/Schriftgiessereien.html "http://www.klingspor-museum.de/Schriftgiessereien.html")

It looks like Bernhard-Antiqua (Flinsch) and [Bernhard Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20131219060123/http:/www.identifont.com/find?font=Bernhard&q=Go) (Bauer) were issued around 1912:  
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131219060123im_/http:/farm6.staticflickr.com/5050/5219056973_51bbb2e9f0_z.jpg)
Thanks so much guys - lots to choose from here.
